plumber2: Easy and Powerful Webservers

Source: R/plumber2-package.R
plumber2-package.Rd

Automatically create a webserver from annotated 'R' files or by building it up programmatically. Provides automatic 'OpenAPI' documentation, input handling, async support, and middleware support.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://plumber2.posit.co/

  • https://github.com/posit-dev/plumber2

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/posit-dev/plumber2/issues
